database.name: VIEW A_ASSET_AMORTIZATION
database.view: SELECT A_ASSET.AD_Client_ID, A_ASSET.AD_Org_ID, A_ASSET.ISACTIVE, A_ASSET.CREATED, A_ASSET.CREATEDBY, A_ASSET.UPDATED, A_ASSET.UPDATEDBY, A_ASSET.A_ASSET_ID, A_AMORTIZATION.A_AMORTIZATION_ID, A_AMORTIZATION.STARTDATE, A_AMORTIZATION.ENDDATE, A_AMORTIZATIONLINE.AMORTIZATION_PORCENTAGE, A_AMORTIZATIONLINE.AMORTIZATIONAMT FROM A_ASSET, A_AMORTIZATION, A_AMORTIZATIONLINE WHERE A_ASSET.A_ASSET_ID = A_AMORTIZATIONLINE.A_ASSET_ID AND A_AMORTIZATIONLINE.A_AMORTIZATION_ID = A_AMORTIZATION.A_AMORTIZATION_ID
